entry.name: commandName
entry.label: Plasmoid label
entry.default: GA_Control

entry.name: scriptWhite
entry.label: Script to set colour white
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant change all lights to white

entry.name: scriptRed
entry.label: Script to set colour red
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant change all lights to red

entry.name: scriptGreen
entry.label: Script to set colour green
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant change all lights to forest green

entry.name: scriptBlue
entry.label: Script to set colour blue
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant change all lights to blue

entry.name: scriptlightsOn
entry.label: Script to turn all lights on
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn all lights on

entry.name: scriptlightsOff
entry.label: Script to turn all lights off
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn all lights off

entry.name: scriptBrightness
entry.label: Script to turn all lights off
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant set all lights brightness to

entry.name: plug1name
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: Server

entry.name: scriptplug1
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn on server plug

entry.name: scriptplug1x
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn off server plug

entry.name: plug2name
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: Bedside

entry.name: scriptplug2
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn on Bed plug

entry.name: scriptplug2x
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn off Bed plug

entry.name: plug3name
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: TV

entry.name: scriptplug3
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn on TV plug

entry.name: scriptplug3x
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn off TV plug

entry.name: plug4name
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: Lizard Cage

entry.name: scriptplug4
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn on Lizard plug

entry.name: scriptplug4x
entry.label: name of plug
entry.default: distrobox-enter --name ubuntu -- /home/deck/assistant turn off Lizard plug

entry.name: killassistant
entry.label: button to kill assistant if needed
entry.default: killall assistant
